name: GDLite
description: This mod turns Geometry dash into Geometry Dash Lite, purely cosmetic, doesn't actually restrict you from any Full Version features.

hide-lite-spr.name: Hide Lite Sprite
hide-lite-spr.description: Hides the Lite Sprite from MenuLayer

hide-gdlite-watermark.name: Hide the GDLite watermark
hide-gdlite-watermark.description: Hides the 'GDLite, Free Trial' watermark from PlayLayer.
